plot: SPECTRE : Spectral Conditioning Helps to Overcome the Expressivity Limits of One-shot Graph Generators
summary: They approach graph generation problem from a spectral perspective by generating dominant parts of the graph Laplacian spectrum and then building a graph matching these eigenvalues and eigenvectors. Spectral conditioning allows for direct modeling of the global and local graph structure and helps to overcome expressivity and mode collapse issues of one-shot graph generators.
